Text:
Not much new here Angel, 30 days, Being Human - I can go on - but I enjoy it, epic love story between feuding vampires, though Im not sure how they will procede, seems more like a very cool mini than an Idea for an ongoing series.

Lastly - so are they vampires or werewolves, because they seem to be BOTH!?
downtown dude, please no spoilers in any of your comments...
I'm having a hard time finding I, Vampire #3, can someone help me out w/ a link? thanks!
